description: Navi Pillay, a member of the UN Commission of Inquiry on the occupied Palestinian territory, says an independent investigation found Israel is carrying out a “concerted policy” to destroy Gaza’s health system.
title: UN accuses Israel of ‘deliberate war crimes’ against Gaza’s healthcare system

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Foreign Ministry on Thursday summoned the German charge affairs over Germany’s move in denying consular services to Iranian citizens living in the Western European country, calling the move “unacceptable and unjustifiable”.
title: Tehran summons German diplomat as Berlin decides to close Iranian consulates

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s permanent representative to the United Nations Office and other international organizations in Geneva have severely censured the latest Israeli strikes against Iran's military sites, stating that the Islamic Republic will not hesitate to exercise its legitimate right and defend its sovereignty and territorial integrity.
title: Tehran says won't hesitate to defend sovereignty, Iran UN mission says of Israeli attack

description: TEHRAN – Saudi Foreign Minister Faisal bin Farhan said on Thursday that the relations between the Saudi Kingdom and Iran are on advancing on the “right path”.
title: Saudi FM says ties with Iran on the ‘right path’

description: Lebanon's prime minister, Najib Mikati, has blasted Israel for its evacuation orders, the latest of which came on Thursday and displaced people in 10 towns and villages, as residents of Baalbek, Ain Bourday and Duris received renewed evacuation orders.
title: Lebanese PM calls Israel’s evacuation orders a ‘war crime’

description: Lebanese Parliament Speaker Nabih Berri emphasized that Lebanese leaders are not prepared to change the terms of UN Security Council Resolution 1701.
title: Nabih Berri affirms Lebanon's commitment to 'unchanged' resolution 1701

description: TEHRAN - The Group of Friends in Defense of the Charter of the United Nations has said Israel's recent aggression against Iran was a blatant violation of the UN Charter, the fundamental principles of international law and the country’s territorial integrity and national sovereignty.
title: UN group says Israel attack on Iran flagrant violation of intl. law
